question: Show Spanish-speaking servers and chefs.
sql_query1:
SELECT Staff.name 
FROM Staff JOIN Languages ON Staff.LanguageID = Languages.ID
WHERE (Staff.Position = "Chef" OR Staff.Position = "Server") AND Languages.Language = "Spanish"
sql_query2:
SELECT Staff.name 
FROM Staff JOIN Languages ON Staff.LanguageID = Languages.ID
WHERE Staff.Position = "Chef" OR Staff.Position = "Server" AND Languages.Language = "Spanish"
interpretation1: What chefs speak Spanish and what servers also speak it?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all chefs and also provide a list of all Spanish-speaking servers.
